thread.title: ‘New China’ Stocks Find Success in Middle Class
thread.title_full: ‘New China’ Stocks Find Success in Middle Class - WSJ

author: Wei Gu
title: ‘New China’ Stocks Find Success in Middle Class
text:
China’s economic transformation has become a painful, slow affair. But a new group of winners is already emerging that is drawing the attention of investors.
These companies cater to China’s middle-class consumers, who policy makers hope will take up the slack in the economy as stalwart industries such as steel making and real estate... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
